Name: Buena Vida (by Gonzalo Cabado)
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Cardamom honey
Review: “I have made a cocktail to create a moment and a lasting impression, and inspired by an era of elegance and finesse behind the bar. “In the early 20th Century, The Bartenders Club in Havana, Cuba was the place where all those with good taste came to enjoy the hospitality and cocktails that were banned in the US. BACARDÍ was at the centre of this ‘golden age of cocktails’ – and today it hosts bartenders from around the globe to create, share and display a new generation of drinks that will be part of the BACARDÍ Legacy and culture. I want to honour the grace, virtuosity and graciousness of these bartenders, and add my drink to this legacy.”
History: Argentinean BACARDÍ Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Gonzalo Cabado at Nicky Harrison, Palermo, Buenos Aires, Argentina.
Nutrition: One serving of Buena Vida (by Gonzalo Cabado) contains 166 calories
Garnish: Sugar cane leaf and grapefruit zest twist
